function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourists modifying transportation modes to prefer self-driving tours or recreational vehicles, leading to potential increase in road accidents and traffic congestion.","Impact":"Increased risk of road accidents and traffic congestion may lead to injuries, fatalities, and economic losses.","Mitigation":"Invest in road safety education, infrastructure improvements, and traffic management strategies to reduce the risk.","Technologies":"Advanced driver assistance systems, vehicle-to-vehicle communication, and autonomous vehicles.","People":"Tourists, local residents, transportation authorities.","Owner":"Government agencies, transportation companies, tourism organizations."},{"Description":"Tourists avoiding public transport due to fear of contracting illnesses, leading to decreased usage of public transport and potential overcrowding of roads and highways.","Impact":"Decreased usage of public transport may lead to increased traffic congestion, air pollution, and road accidents.","Mitigation":"Enhance sanitation and hygiene measures on public transport, promote alternative transport modes such as cycling and walking, and improve public transport infrastructure and services.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air purification systems, and real-time public transport tracking apps.","People":"Tourists, public transport users, urban residents.","Owner":"Public transport operators, local governments, tourism organizations."},{"Description":"Preference for private car services leading to decreased social distancing and increased risk of disease transmission within the vehicle.","Impact":"Decreased social distancing may lead to increased risk of disease transmission among passengers and drivers.","Mitigation":"Promote use of face masks, implement air filtration systems, and limit passenger capacity in private car services.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and contact tracing apps.","People":"Tourists, private car service users, drivers.","Owner":"Private car service companies, government agencies, health authorities."}]}
